data.subject: ComfyUI-LightGlue
data.question: What is ComfyUI-LightGlue and how does it relate to MotionBrush?
data.answer: ComfyUI-LightGlue is an implementation of LightGlue for ComfyUI that generates a MotionBrush for DragNUWA. It provides a way to control the motion in images and videos using comfortable UI elements.

data.subject: ComfyUI-LightGlue
data.question: How do I install ComfyUI-LightGlue?
data.answer: To install ComfyUI-LightGlue, clone the repo into the custom_nodes directory of your ComfyUI location and run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.

data.subject: ComfyUI-LightGlue
data.question: Where can I find example workflows for ComfyUI-LightGlue?
data.answer: You can find example workflows for ComfyUI-LightGlue at the provided URLs: https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-LightGlue/blob/main/workflow_video.json and https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI-LightGlue/blob/main/workflow_lightgluemotionbrush.json.

data.subject: ComfyUI-LightGlue
data.question: What tool is available for Motion Brush visualization with ComfyUI-LightGlue?
data.answer: The Motion Brush Visualization Tool is available for ComfyUI-LightGlue at: https://chaojie.github.io/ComfyUI-LightGlue/tools/draw.html.
